content: *Another cycle spent sleeping on the cold, unforgiving metal floor inside a shelter scattered amongst the many regions, woken up by the grinding of metal and whizzing of gears, the large blast door sliding open into the outside, vast, moist air entering the shelter, filling it with the scent of fresh, now halted rainfall.*
